item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Cafe Noir across from Olives and next to Mills Tavern on N. Main St.

So, its the Monday before the Holiday, and all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a.........oh, wait, we're not there yet! Whew! There are a few days left before the fesitivities begin and everyone trundles off to grandma's house, your parent's house, your house or whatever. So come down to Cafe Noir for an hour or two, take a break and enjoy some good cheer with friends from the Collective and maybe a beer. - did that rhyme? Cafe Noir is decked for the Holidays, so, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Cafe Noir!
